    • Method Detail

      • sumHash

        public static int sumHash(int leftHash,
                          int rightHash)
        Sums the hash of the left and the right children

        May be used only when calculating a non-leaf node's hash code from its children's hashes.

        Parameters:
        leftHash - The hash of the left child
        rightHash - The hash of the right child
        Returns:
        the accumulated hash
        See Also:
        addHash(int, int), removeHash(int, int)

      • getLevelOfNode

        public static int getLevelOfNode(int nodeOrder)
        Returns the level a node with the given order is on in the tree
        Parameters:
        nodeOrder - The breadth-first order of a node for which its level to be calculated
        Returns:
        the level which the node with order is on

      • compareTrees

        public static Collection<Integer> compareTrees(com.hazelcast.wan.merkletree.MerkleTreeView local,
                                               com.hazelcast.wan.merkletree.MerkleTreeView remote)
        Compares the provided local and the remote Merkle trees and returns the breadth-first orders of the leaves that found to be different.

        This method compares only the leaves instead of traversing only the subtrees that are different. This way possible hash collisions inside the tree don't remain hidden and then syncing the clusters can be initiated. This comes at the cost of comparing every leaf at every comparison.

        Parameters:
        local - The view of the local Merkle tree
        remote - The view of the remote Merkle tree
        Returns:
        the order of the leaves found to be different

      • writeLeaves

        public static void writeLeaves(DataOutput out,
                               com.hazelcast.wan.merkletree.MerkleTreeView merkleTreeView)
                        throws IOException
        Writes the hashes of the leaves of a Merkle tree into the provided DataOutput
        Parameters:
        out - The data output to write the leaves into
        merkleTreeView - The Merkle tree which leaves to be written into the data output
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • createRemoteMerkleTreeView

        public static RemoteMerkleTreeView createRemoteMerkleTreeView(DataInput in)
                                                       throws IOException
        Creates a RemoteMerkleTreeView by reading the hashes of the leaves of a Merkle tree from the provided DataInput
        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Throws:
